attributes.action: Support and promote any bid for England/Britain to hold the 2018 World Cup.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: By signing this petition you are showing your support and encouragement towards England/Britain compiling a major bid to host the 2018 world cup. The last world cup tournament held in this country was 1966 the only year in which England have ever managed to win the prestigious trophy. The current infrastructure and facilities mean as a country we can launch a strong bid and with the near completion of Wembley we have a stadium worthy of being at the heart of the world’s greatest competition.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
